title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor to hike prices on select vehicles from April 1
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor announced plans to raise prices of select vehicles by up to 1% starting April 1 due to increasing input costs and operational expenses. The price hike will affect certain grades of specific models, with the automaker citing escalating operational expenditures and input costs as reasons.
